sections.heading: of gas; rules and regulations; tolerances
sections.text: The Department of Agriculture is authorized to promulgate and adopt such rules and regulations and establish tolerances within a maximum of two percent, plus or minus, which may be necessary for the enforcement of sections 57-508 to 57-516.SourceLaws 1957, c

57-512.Sale of gas; rules and regulations; tolerances.

The Department of Agriculture is authorized to promulgate and adopt such rules and regulations and establish tolerances within a maximum of two percent, plus or minus, which may be necessary for the enforcement of sections 57-508 to 57-516.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 240, ยง 5, p. 802.
